channel.title: verses on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in verses on Let's see what happens.

item.title: 26th of December
item.description: From higher lights A star install I In plainest stream Through temperance tree

item.title: Milky Way
item.description: Маленькие звёзды в тумане Время сделает вас человеком Острый месяц начертит линий Строем сами пойдёте при этом.

item.title: Animation
item.description: Should I thaw under Serbian sun that’s reflected on me from the flowers? Traces merge into pictures and flames animating my hours. Is it statue making a step or a travler lost in the grass… Wanted web for someone like me! Can’t it be other way can’t it be.
